Name: ## IDENTIFIERS - Basic customer identification and contact attributes
BDC-User-Full-Name
Description: Business Development Center user assigned to customer

Name: CS-Client-Last-RO-Date
Description: Date of customer's last repair order

Name: ## SALES - Vehicle purchase and sales-related attributes
Sales-Stock-Number
Description: Inventory stock number of sold vehicle

Name: CS-Client-Last-RO-Date
Description: Date of customer's last repair order

Name: DMS-Last-RO-Date
Description: Last repair order date in DMS

Name: DMS-Last-RO-Number
Description: Last repair order number in DMS

Name: ## PRE-OWNED - Trade-in and used vehicle attributes
Collection Example
Description: Iterate through a collection of customer vehicles

Name: Collection Item Access
Description: Access specific items in a collection with index, filters, and maps

Name: Snippet Include
Description: Include reusable content snippets in templates

Name: Snippet With Parameters
Liquid Example:
{% include 'vehicle_offer' with make: customer.Desired-Make, model: customer.Desired-Model %}
{% include 'appointment_details' with date: customer.CS-RO-Date, advisor: customer.Advisor-Name %}

Name: Conditional Logic
Description: Conditional content based on customer attributes

Name: Math Operations
Liquid Example:
{% assign days_since_service = 'now' | date: '%s' | minus: customer.CS-Client-Last-RO-Date | date: '%s' | divided_by: 86400 %}
{{ days_since_service }} days since your last service
